name: Pitwall.me
description: An F1 telemetry dashboard that allows users to create their own race engineer dashboards to view real-time or past session telemetry data.

features.name: Customizable Dashboards
features.description: Users can create and customize their own dashboards with a variety of widgets to display F1 data.

features.name: Real-Time Data
features.description: View live telemetry data during F1 sessions.

features.name: Session Replays
features.description: Review telemetry data from past F1 sessions.

features.name: Variety of Widgets
features.description: Includes widgets for lap times, driver tracking, weather, and more.
